msg: 'abstract' modifier can only appear on a class, method, or property declaration.
An implementation cannot be declared in ambient contexts.
Non-abstract class 'CC' does not implement inherited abstract member 'foo' from class 'AA'.
Non-abstract class 'DD' does not implement inherited abstract member 'foo' from class 'BB'.
Non-abstract class 'FF' does not implement inherited abstract member 'foo' from class 'CC'.
